summary.para: Contains information about the creation flags, input channels, and sample rate of a voice.

remarks.para: Note the DirectX SDK versions of XAUDIO2 do not support the ActiveFlags member.
Windows 10 (XAudio2.9); Windows 8, Windows Phone 8 (XAudio 2.8); DirectX SDK (XAudio 2.7)

summary.para: Flags used to create the voice; see the individual voice interfaces for more information.
Flags that are currently set on the voice.
The number of input channels the voice expects.
The input sample rate the voice expects.
